channel.title: Safe Zone problem
channel.description:
I'm having trouble with making a safe zone. I've followed a few tips from posts from around the forum and done exactly as they say but my home zone wont appear as a safe zone. Says 'Wild' in the bottom corner. Heres a pic of roughly where i'm trying to add safezone.
[img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/4459/56398335.png[/img]
I've been doing is as:
x y
y x
